thread.section_title: Hotel Muguet - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A hidden gem
thread.title_full: A hidden gem - Review of Hotel Muguet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: peanutyoda
title: A hidden gem
text: I have stayed in this hotel many times and it has been a pleasure each visit. Just a short walk from the metro station Ecole Militaire this is a hidden gem - close to just about everything but conveniently hidden away on a small and quiet street. The owners and staff are very nice and they will give you advice on the best restaurants and sights if you ask. If you are lucky you will get a room overlooking the Eiffel Tower but all rooms are newly renovated and a pleasure to stay in. For me this hotel is my home away from home and I love it.
